channel.title: Social Protection on Lionel Ragot
channel.description: Recent content in Social Protection on Lionel Ragot

item.title: The fiscal Impact of 30 Years of Immigration in France: an Accounting Approach
item.description: This article aims to evaluate the net contribution of immigration to the public finances of France between the late 1970s and the early 2010s.

item.title: The fiscal Impact of 30 Years of Immigration in France: an Accounting Approach
item.description: This article aims to evaluate the net contribution of immigration to the public finances of France between the late 1970s and the early 2010s.

item.title: Impacts of Immigration on an Ageing Welfare State: An Applied General Equilibrium Model for France
item.description: In this paper, we evaluate, using a dynamic general equilibrium model, the contribution of migration policy in reducing the tax burden associated with the ageing population in France.
